column6:
The pulse-pounding conclusion to the miniseries tied directly to the New Avengers!,2005,8
With the fate of four hundred defenseless families on the line, Spider-Man's got a web full of trouble! Up against no less than eight escaped psychotic super-villains, will Spidey finally call in a little help from his new "Amazing" friends?
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | inker:Raul Fernandez | penciller (cover):Manuel Garcia | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
